remarks: The value of vector subtraction in the dual of a vector space. (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ldualvsub.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualvsub.n $e |- N = ( invg ` R ) $.
ldualvsub.u $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
ldualvsub.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualvsub.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualvsub.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) $.
ldualvsub.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
ldualvsub.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` D ) $.
ldualvsub.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldualvsub.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldualvsub.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
ldualvsub $p |- ( ph -> ( G .- H ) = ( G .+ ( ( N ` .1. ) .x. H ) ) ) $.
